data.title: Dennis Quaid Shares His Role In "I Can Only Imagine"
data.meta_description: Movie icon Dennis Quaid stars in the new movie, based on the MercyMe song, "I Can Only Imagine." Dennis talks about the movie, the character he plays, and the importance of faith in the life of his real-life counterpart he plays in the movie.
data.text:
Movie icon Dennis Quaid stars in the new movie, based on the MercyMe song, "I Can Only Imagine."

Dennis talks about the movie, the character he plays, and the importance of faith in the life of his real-life counterpart he plays in the movie.

The song which inspired millions is finally getting a feature film. In this brief clip, veteran actor Dennis Quaid talks about his role in the upcoming Christian film, “I Can Only Imagine”. This story of family, redemption, and forgiveness is set to hit theaters March of 2018. If you love movies with a strong Christian message, this is one story you don’t want to miss!
